products.name: Pipeline Slim-Fit MaxFlex Jeans
products.product_desc: Don't settle for ordinary. These men's Urban Pipeline slim-fit jeans are a cut above the rest.

products.name: 511 Slim Fit Stretch Jeans
products.product_desc: A modern slim with room to move, the 511 Slim Fit Jeans are a classic. Cut close to the body, these jeans are a great alternative to a skinny jean. You'll get the same lean look with added comfort.

products.name: Pipeline Slim Straight Leg Jeans
products.product_desc: Every casual occasion calls for these men's Urban Pipeline jeans.

products.name: Chaps Straight Fit Stretch Jeans
products.product_desc: Always ahead of the curve. These men's jeans from Chaps feature styling that takes your look to a new level.

products.name: Nike Dri FIT Training Tee
products.product_desc: No matter what you're training for, this men's Nike tee is a comfy choice.

products.name: Nike Camo Pullover Hoodie
products.product_desc: You'll blend right in comfortably in this men's Nike pullover hoodie.

products.name: Nike Full Zip Jersey Hoodie
products.product_desc: Add an extra layer of comfort to your everyday look with this men's Nike hoodie.

products.name: Nike Blade Regular Golf Polo
products.product_desc: Fairway fashion. Featuring a moisture-wicking fabric and sporty style, this men's polo from Nike keeps you comfortable and stylish from tee to green.
